entry.title: Bitcoin XT Fork
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around a proposal to create a separate email list for non-technical discussions and reserve the bitcoin-dev list for more academic and technical debates. The current list is criticized as being too noisy and lacks decorum, drowning out any meaningful debates. The issue of Satoshi's return is also brought up and whether or not his participation would be treated with undue authority. There is a debate over whether or not to manually approve new subscribers to prevent potential abuses and whether or not to block the creator's old email addresses. The impact of Satoshi's opinion on the community is discussed, with some suggesting that his words carry a lot of weight and could influence people to do something dangerous or wrong. Overall, the discussion focuses on improving the quality and relevance of discussions on the bitcoin-dev mailing list.
